item.text: Then we turned and set out toward the wilderness on the way to the Red Sea just as the Lord told me to do, detouring around Mount Seir for a long time.
At this point the Lord said to me,

“You have <st data-num="05437" class="">circled around</st> <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="02022" class="">mountain</st> <st data-num="07227" class="">long enough</st>; now <st data-num="06437" class="">turn</st> <st data-num="06828" class="">north</st>.

<st data-num="06680" class="">Instruct</st><n id="1" /> these <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">as follows</st>: ‘<st data-num="0859" class="">You</st> are about to <st data-num="05674" class="">cross</st> the <st data-num="01366" class="">border</st> of your <st data-num="0251" class="">relatives</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="06215" class="">Esau</st>,<n id="3" /> who <st data-num="03427" class="">inhabit</st> <st data-num="08165" class="">Seir</st>. They will <st data-num="03372" class="">be afraid</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">of</st> you, so <st data-num="08104" class="">watch</st> yourselves <st data-num="03966" class="">carefully</st>.

Do <st data-num="0408" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01624" class="">be hostile</st> toward them, <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> I am <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="05414" class="">giving</st> you any of their <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>, <st data-num="05704" class="">not even</st> a <st data-num="04096 03709 07272">footprint</st>, <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> I have <st data-num="05414" class="">given</st> <st data-num="02022" class="">Mount</st> <st data-num="08165" class="">Seir</st><n id="1" /> as an <st data-num="03425" class="">inheritance</st> for <st data-num="06215" class="">Esau</st>.

You may <st data-num="07666 03701">purchase</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0400" class="">food</st> to <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> <st data-num="01571">and</st> <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st> to <st data-num="08354" class="">drink</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">from</st> them.

All along the way I, the Lord your God, have blessed your every effort. I have been attentive to your travels through this great wilderness. These 40 years I have been with you; you have lacked nothing.’”

So we turned away from our relatives the descendants of Esau, the inhabitants of Seir, turning from the route of the rift valley which comes up from Elat and Ezion Geber, and traveling the way of the wilderness of Moab.

Then the Lord said to me, “Do not harass Moab and provoke them to war, for I will not give you any of their land as your territory. This is because I have given Ar to the descendants of Lot as their possession.

(The <st data-num="0368" class="">Emites</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="06440" class="">used to</st> <st data-num="03427" class="">live</st> there, a <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> as <st data-num="01419" class="">powerful</st>, <st data-num="07227" class="">numerous</st>, and <st data-num="07311" class="">tall</st> as the <st data-num="06062" class="">Anakites</st>.

<st data-num="01992" class="">These people</st>, as well as the <st data-num="06062" class="">Anakites</st>, are <st data-num="0637" class="">also</st> <st data-num="02803" class="">considered</st> <st data-num="07497" class="">Rephaites</st>;<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="04125" class="">Moabites</st> <st data-num="07121" class="">call</st> them <st data-num="0368" class="">Emites</st>.

Previously the Horites lived in Seir, but the descendants of Esau dispossessed and destroyed them and settled in their place, just as Israel did to the land it came to possess, the land the Lord gave them.)

<st data-num="06258" class="">Now</st>, <st data-num="06965" class="">get up</st> and <st data-num="05674" class="">cross</st> the <st data-num="05158" class="">Wadi</st> <st data-num="02218" class="">Zered</st>.”<n id="1" /> So we <st data-num="05674">did</st> <st data-num="05158 02218">so</st>.<n id="2" />

Now the length of time it took for us to go from Kadesh Barnea to the crossing of Wadi Zered was thirty-eight years, time for all the military men of that generation to die, just as the Lord had vowed to them.
Indeed, it was the very hand of the Lord that eliminated them from within the camp until they were all gone.
So it was that after all the military men had been eliminated from the community,
the Lord said to me,

“<st data-num="03117" class="">Today</st> <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> are going to <st data-num="05674" class="">cross</st> the <st data-num="01366" class="">border</st> of <st data-num="04124" class="">Moab</st>, that is, of <st data-num="06144" class="">Ar</st>.<n id="1" />

But when you come close to the Ammonites, do not harass or provoke them because I am not giving you any of the Ammonites’ land as your possession; I have already given it to Lot’s descendants as their possession.”
(That also is considered to be a land of the Rephaites. The Rephaites lived there originally; the Ammonites call them Zamzummites.
They are a people as powerful, numerous, and tall as the Anakites. But the Lord destroyed the Rephaites in advance of the Ammonites, so they dispossessed them and settled down in their place.

This is exactly <st data-num="0834" class="">what</st> he <st data-num="06213" class="">did</st> for the <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="06215" class="">Esau</st> who <st data-num="03427" class="">lived</st> in <st data-num="08165" class="">Seir</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">when</st> he <st data-num="08045" class="">destroyed</st> the <st data-num="02752" class="">Horites</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">before</st> them so that they could <st data-num="03423" class="">dispossess</st> them and <st data-num="03427" class="">settle</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">in</st> their <st data-num="08478" class="">area</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> very <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st>.
As for the Avvites who lived in settlements as far west as Gaza, Caphtorites who came from Crete destroyed them and settled down in their place.)
“Get up, make your way across Wadi Arnon. Look, I have already delivered over to you Sihon the Amorite, king of Heshbon, and his land. Go ahead—take it! Engage him in war!
This very day I will begin to fill all the people of the earth with dread and to terrify them when they hear about you. They will shiver and shake in anticipation of your approach.”
Then I sent messengers from the Kedemoth wilderness to King Sihon of Heshbon with an offer of peace:

“Let us <st data-num="05674" class="">pass</st> through your <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>; we will <st data-num="01980" class="">keep</st> <st data-num="01870" class="">strictly</st> to the <st data-num="01870" class="">roadway</st>.<n id="1" /> We will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="05493" class="">turn aside</st> to the <st data-num="03225" class="">right</st> or the <st data-num="08040" class="">left</st>.

<st data-num="07666" class="">Sell</st> us <st data-num="0400" class="">food</st> for <st data-num="03701" class="">cash</st><n id="1" /> so that we can <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> and <st data-num="03701 05414">sell</st> us <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st> to <st data-num="08354" class="">drink</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="07535" class="">Just</st> allow us to <st data-num="05674" class="">go through</st> on <st data-num="07272" class="">foot</st>,
just as the descendants of Esau who live at Seir and the Moabites who live in Ar did for us, until we cross the Jordan to the land the Lord our God is giving us.”
But King Sihon of Heshbon was unwilling to allow us to pass near him because the Lord our God had made him obstinate and stubborn so that he might deliver him over to you this very day.
The Lord said to me, “Look! I have already begun to give over Sihon and his land to you. Start right now to take his land as your possession.”

When <st data-num="05511" class="">Sihon</st> and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> his <st data-num="05971" class="">troops</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03318">emerged</st> to <st data-num="07125" class="">encounter</st> us in <st data-num="04421" class="">battle</st> at <st data-num="03096" class="">Jahaz</st>,<n id="2" />
the Lord our God delivered him over to us and we struck him down, along with his sons and everyone else.

At <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="06256" class="">time</st> we <st data-num="03920" class="">seized</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> his <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> and <st data-num="02763" class="">put</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">every</st> <st data-num="05892 04962">one</st> of them<n id="1" /> <st data-num="02763" class="">under divine judgment</st>,<n id="2" /> including even the <st data-num="0802" class="">women</st> and <st data-num="02945" class="">children</st>; we <st data-num="07604" class="">left</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">no</st> <st data-num="08300" class="">survivors</st>.

We <st data-num="0962" class="">kept</st> <st data-num="07535" class="">only</st> the <st data-num="0929" class="">livestock</st> and <st data-num="07998" class="">plunder</st> from the <st data-num="05892 0834 03920">cities</st> for ourselves.
From Aroer, which is at the edge of Wadi Arnon (it is the city in the wadi), all the way to Gilead there was not a town able to resist us—the Lord our God gave them all to us.
However, you did not approach the land of the Ammonites, the Wadi Jabbok, the cities of the hill country, or any place else forbidden by the Lord our God.
